title: 1br near I-55, Ashland Orange Train Line, Mariano's & Downtown
posting_body: Monthly rent $1000, seek person with good credit, good rental history and stable yearly gross income of at least $40,000 (30% general rule of thumb rent to gross income).

Bright 2nd floor one bedroom apartment, high ceilings, two small closets, private front entryway and pictured kitchen stove/fridge/pantry, please note bedroom measures roughly 8 feet x 8 feet, fits queen bed.
Tri-area of McKinley Park, Pilsen and Bridgeport.
Short walk to bus stop, the Ashland Orange Train Line, the Riverside Square Shopping Center, and popular Mariano's Supermarket.
Just south of the Stevenson Expressway (I-55) and relatively close to UIC and Downtown schools of Depaul, Roosevelt and Columbia.
Street parking in front of building, no parking meters or permit parking restrictions.
Owner pays water, trash and sewer.
Tenant pays own utilities (gas, heat and electric).
No pets, no smoking and no onsite laundry, laundromats nearby.
